026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html;
027
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Set;
030
031import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
032
033import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.Navigation.PageMode;
034import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlAttr;
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlId;
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlStyle;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlTree;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.Text;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
040import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFileIOException;
041import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocPath;
042import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocPaths;
043import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.PreviewAPIListBuilder;
044
045import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
046
047/**
048 * Generate File to list all the preview elements with the
049 * appropriate links.
050 */
051public class PreviewListWriter
052        extends SummaryListWriter<PreviewAPIListBuilder> {
053
054    /**
055     * Constructor.
056     *
057     * @param configuration the configuration for this doclet
058     * @param filename the file to be generated
059     */
060    public PreviewListWriter(HtmlConfiguration configuration,
061            DocPath filename) {
062        super(configuration, filename, configuration.previewAPIListBuilder);
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * Get list of all the preview elements.
067     * Then instantiate PreviewListWriter and generate File.
068     *
069     * @param configuration the current configuration of the doclet.
070     * @throws DocFileIOException if there is a problem writing the preview list
071     */
072    public static void generate(HtmlConfiguration configuration)
073            throws DocFileIOException {
074        if (configuration.conditionalPages
075            .contains(HtmlConfiguration.ConditionalPage.PREVIEW)) {
076            DocPath filename = DocPaths.PREVIEW_LIST;
077            PreviewListWriter depr
078                = new PreviewListWriter(configuration, filename);
079            depr.generateSummaryListFile(PageMode.PREVIEW, "preview elements",
080                configuration.contents.previewAPI,
081                "doclet.Window_Preview_List");
082        }
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    protected void addContentSelectors(Content target) {
087        Set<PreviewAPIListBuilder.JEP> jeps = builder.getJEPs();
088        if (!jeps.isEmpty()) {
089            int index = 0;
090            target.add(HtmlTree
091                .P(contents.getContent("doclet.Preview_API_Checkbox_Label")));
092            Content list = HtmlTree.UL(HtmlStyle.previewFeatureList);
093            for (var jep : jeps) {
094                index++;
095                HtmlId htmlId = HtmlId.of("feature-" + index);
096                String jepUrl
097                    = resources.getText("doclet.Preview_JEP_URL", jep.number());
098                list.add(HtmlTree.LI(HtmlTree.LABEL(htmlId.name(),
099                    HtmlTree.INPUT("checkbox", htmlId)
100                        .put(HtmlAttr.CHECKED, "")
101                        .put(HtmlAttr.ONCLICK,
102                            "toggleGlobal(this, '" + index + "', 3)"))
103                    .add(HtmlTree.SPAN(Text.of(jep.number() + ": "))
104                        .add(HtmlTree.A(jepUrl, Text
105                            .of(jep.title() + " (" + jep.status() + ")"))))));
106            }
107            target.add(list);
108        }
109    }
110
111    @Override
112    protected void addComments(Element e, Content desc) {
113        List<? extends DocTree> tags = utils.getFirstSentenceTrees(e);
114        if (!tags.isEmpty()) {
115            addPreviewComment(e, tags, desc);
116        } else {
117            desc.add(Text.EMPTY);
118        }
119    }
120
121    @Override
122    protected void addTableTabs(Table<Element> table, String headingKey) {
123        table.setGridStyle(HtmlStyle.threeColumnSummary)
124            .setDefaultTab(getTableCaption(headingKey))
125            .setAlwaysShowDefaultTab(true)
126            .setRenderTabs(false);
127        for (PreviewAPIListBuilder.JEP jep : builder.getJEPs()) {
128            table.addTab(Text.EMPTY, element -> jep == builder.getJEP(element));
129        }
130    }
131
132    @Override
133    protected Content getExtraContent(Element element) {
134        PreviewAPIListBuilder.JEP jep
135            = configuration.previewAPIListBuilder.getJEP(element);
136        return jep == null ? Text.EMPTY : Text.of(jep.title());
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    protected TableHeader getTableHeader(String headerKey) {
141        return new TableHeader(
142            contents.getContent(headerKey),
143            Text.of("Preview Feature"),
144            contents.descriptionLabel)
145                .sortable(true, true, false); // Allow sorting by element name
146                                              // and feature
147    }
148
149    @Override
150    protected HtmlStyle[] getColumnStyles() {
151        return new HtmlStyle[] { HtmlStyle.colSummaryItemName,
152            HtmlStyle.colSecond, HtmlStyle.colLast };
153    }
154}
